title: matthewshammond's Setup (Nord)
author: matthewshammond
description: A SketchyBar configuration shared by matthewshammond in the community showcase thread.

dotfiles.colors.sh:
#!/usr/bin/env bash

# C O L O R  P A L E TT E

# S T A N D A R D  C O L O R S
BLACK=#181926
WHITE=#ffffff
RED=#ff0000
GREEN=#00ff00
BLUE=#0000ff
YELLOW=#ffff00
ORANGE=#ffa500
MAGENTA=#ff00ff
GRAY=#808080
TRANSPARENT=#000000

# N O R D
NORD0=#2E3440
NORD1=#3B4252
NORD2=#434C5E
NORD3=#4C566A
NORD4=#D8DEE9
NORD5=#E5E9F0
NORD6=#ECEFF4
NORD7=#8FBCBB
NORD8=#88C0D0
NORD9=#81A1C1
NORD10=#5E81AC
NORD11=#BF616A
NORD12=#D08770
NORD13=#EBCB8B
NORD14=#A3BE8C
NORD15=#B48EAD
dotfiles.plugins/wifi.sh:
#!/usr/bin/env bash

source "$HOME/.config/sketchybar/colors.sh"

CURRENT_WIFI="$(/System/Library/PrivateFrameworks/Apple80211.framework/Versions/Current/Resources/airport -I)"
SSID="$(echo "$CURRENT_WIFI" | grep -o "SSID: .*" | sed 's/^SSID: //')"

sketchybar --set "Control Center,WiFi" label="${SSID}"
dotfiles.plugins/wifi_click.sh:
#!/usr/bin/env bash

source "$HOME/.config/sketchybar/colors.sh"

export CURRENT_WIFI="$(/System/Library/PrivateFrameworks/Apple80211.framework/Versions/Current/Resources/airport -I)"
export SSID="$(echo "$CURRENT_WIFI" | grep -o "SSID: .*" | sed 's/^SSID: //')"
export CURR_TX="$(echo "$CURRENT_WIFI" | grep -o "lastTxRate: .*" | sed 's/^lastTxRate: //')"

sketchybar --set $NAME label="${CURR_TX}Mbps"
dotfiles.sketchybarrc:
#!/usr/bin/env bash

# I N I T
source $HOME/.config/sketchybar/colors.sh

PLUGIN_DIR="$HOME/.config/sketchybar/plugins" # Directory where all the plugin scripts are stored


# B A R  A P P E A R A N C E
sketchybar --bar height=32            \
                 blur_radius=50       \
                 position=top         \
                 padding_left=10      \
                 padding_right=10     \
                 color=0xff${NORD0:1}


# B A R  D E F A U L T S
sketchybar --default updates=when_shown                       \
                     drawing=on                               \
                     icon.font="Hack Nerd Font:Bold:16.0"     \
                     icon.color=0xff${NORD5:1}                \
                     label.font="Hack Nerd Font:Regular:14.0" \
                     label.color=0xff${NORD6:1}               \
                     label.padding_left=3                     \
                     label.padding_right=3                    \
                     icon.padding_left=3                      \
                     icon.padding_right=3


# C O N T R O L  S P A C E  I N D I C A T O R S
sketchybar --add item logo left                          \
           --set      logo icon=                        \
                      background.padding_left=0          \
                      background.padding_right=5         \
                      background.color=0xff${NORD1:1}    \
                      background.corner_radius=9         \
                      background.height=22               \
                      label.drawing=off                  \
                      icon.padding_left=8                \
                      icon.padding_right=8               \
                      click_script="sketchybar --update"

SPACE_ICONS=("" "" "" "" "" "" "")

for i in "${!SPACE_ICONS[@]}"
do
  sid=$(($i+1))
  sketchybar --add space space.$sid left                                 \
             --set space.$sid associated_space=$sid                      \
                              icon=${SPACE_ICONS[i]}                     \
                              icon.padding_left=4                        \
                              icon.padding_right=4                       \
                              icon.highlight_color=0xff${NORD10:1}       \
                              label.drawing=off                          \
                              script="$PLUGIN_DIR/space.sh"              \
                              click_script="yabai -m space --focus $sid" 
done

sketchybar --add bracket primary_spaces space.1 space.2 space.3 space.4 space.5 space.6 space.7 \
           --set primary_spaces background.color=0xff${NORD3:1} \
                                background.corner_radius=9      \
                                background.height=22


# L E F T  I T E M S
sketchybar --add item space_separator left                             \
           --set space_separator icon=                                \
                                 icon.color=0xff${NORD2:1}             \
                                 background.padding_left=8             \
                                 background.padding_right=0            \
                                 label.drawing=off                     \
                                                                       \
           --add item window_title left                                \
           --set window_title    script="$PLUGIN_DIR/window_title.sh"  \
                                 icon.drawing=off                      \
           --subscribe window_title front_app_switched                 


# R I G H T  I T E M S
sketchybar --add item clock right                                                 \
           --set clock update_freq=10                                             \
                       label.font="SF Pro:Regular:14.0"                           \
                       label.padding_left=0                                       \
                       label.padding_right=8                                      \
                       background.padding_left=5                                  \
                       background.padding_right=5                                 \
                       background.color=0xff${NORD1:1}                            \
                       background.corner_radius=9                                 \
                       background.height=22                                       \
                       script="$PLUGIN_DIR/clock.sh"                              \
                                                                                  \
           --add alias "Control Center,Battery" right                             \
           --set "Control Center,Battery" script="$PLUGIN_DIR/battery.sh"         \
                                          update_freq=10                          \
                                          label.drawing=on                        \
                                          background.padding_left=5               \
                                          background.padding_right=5              \
                                          background.color=0xff${NORD1:1}         \
                                          background.corner_radius=9              \
                                          background.height=22                    \
                                          label.padding_left=-3                   \
                                          label.padding_right=5                   \
                                          icon.padding_left=-3                    \
                                          icon.padding_right=-3                   \
                                                                                  \
           --add alias "Control Center,WiFi" right                                \
           --set "Control Center,WiFi" script="$PLUGIN_DIR/wifi.sh"               \
                                       update_freq=10                             \
                                       label.drawing=on                           \
                                       background.padding_left=5                  \
                                       background.padding_right=5                 \
                                       background.color=0xff${NORD1:1}            \
                                       background.corner_radius=9                 \
                                       background.height=22                       \
                                       label.padding_left=-3                      \
                                       label.padding_right=5                      \
                                       icon.color=0xff${NORD5:1}                  \
                                       icon.padding_left=-3                       \
                                       icon.padding_right=-3                      \
                                                                                  \
           --add alias "Private Internet Access,Item-0" right                     \
           --set "Private Internet Access,Item-0" script="$PLUGIN_DIR/vpn.sh"     \
                                                  background.padding_left=0       \
                                                  background.padding_right=5      \
                                                  background.color=0xff${NORD1:1} \
                                                  background.corner_radius=9      \
                                                  background.height=22            \
                                                  label.drawing=off               \
                                                  icon.padding_left=-5            \
                                                  icon.padding_right=-5


# U P D A T E  B A R
sketchybar --update


# F I N I S H
echo "sketchybar configuration loaded.."
